description:
Albert Maverick is a secondary character in the series "Tiger & Bunny". He is the creator of Hero TV and the CEO of Apollon Media. He is a stern and well-respect figure in Sternbild, and often counsels its mayor.
Albert is later revealed to be the culprit behind Barnaby`s parents murderer, which was done in order to allow him to raise Barnaby to become a Hero. The fact was kept a secret for years thanks to Albert`s Hero power, "Memory Implantation", which manipulates others` minds.
name: Albert Maverick
